title: Shadow Work Foundations
subtitle: Meet the Parts of Yourself You've Been Running From
description: A 5-module journey into understanding and integrating your shadow. Learn what the shadow is, how to find it, and how to bring it into consciousness for genuine transformation.

modules.title: What is the Shadow?
modules.description: Understanding the disowned self and why it matters

modules.title: Finding Your Shadow
modules.description: Practical methods for discovering what you've disowned

modules.title: Meeting the Shadow
modules.description: How to approach shadow material without being overwhelmed

modules.title: Understanding Your Shadow
modules.description: Making sense of what you discover

modules.title: Integrating the Shadow
modules.description: Bringing the shadow home and living more whole

whatYouLearn: Understand what the shadow is and how it forms
Develop practices for ongoing shadow work
Integrate disowned parts for greater wholeness
requirements: Willingness to explore uncomfortable aspects of yourself

questions.question: What is the 'shadow' in Jungian psychology?
options: A dark spirit that follows you
The parts of yourself you've disowned or rejected
Negative thoughts you have about others

questions.question: How does the shadow typically form?
options: By suppressing traits that weren't accepted in childhood
It doesn't form - we're born with it complete

questions.question: What is 'projection' in the context of shadow work?
options: Seeing your disowned qualities in others
Imagining what others think of you

questions.question: What is the healthiest approach to shadow material?
options: Analyze it intellectually without feeling it

questions.question: Which of these is a sign you might be encountering shadow material?
options: Strong emotional reactions to certain traits in others

questions.question: What does 'integrating the shadow' mean?
options: Reclaiming and accepting disowned parts of yourself

questions.question: Why is shadow work considered important for personal growth?
options: It helps you access more of your full potential and reduce unconscious patterns
It proves you're a good person
